title: Criss Angel Returns to Foxwoods® Resort Casino for Famed Water Escape on October 12
text:
Criss Angel Returns to Foxwoods® Resort Casino for Famed Water Escape on October 12 Celebrating his show’s return to the property this fall, The SUPERNATURALISTS creator will appear at Foxwoods for a public performance of the production’s most notorious act October 08, 2015 08:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
MASHANTUCKET, Conn.--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Foxwoods® Resort Casino , the Northeast’s premier hotel, gaming, shopping and entertainment destination, today announced that world-renowned magician Criss Angel will return to the resort next week to host a public water escape performance featuring Spencer Horsman, one of the star illusionists in his live magic ensemble, The SUPERNATURALISTS. 
Under Angel’s direction, Horsman will attempt his Houdini-inspired water chamber escape on Monday, October 12 at 2 p.m. on the Grand Pequot Tower lawn. The daring spectacle, currently part of The SUPERNATURALISTS’ production, has gained Horsman notoriety in his failure to complete the escape during multiple public attempts. 
"Spencer must put it all on the line if he wants to conquer this life threatening challenge once and for all!" said Angel, who revealed that Horsman will retire the act from the show if next Monday’s performance is similarly unsuccessful. 
The performance precedes The SUPERNATURALISTS’ return to Foxwoods this fall, as the show – starring Angel himself in an exclusive world premiere – will reappear at The Fox Theater for two limited runs in November and December. 
“Criss Angel’s genius in creating many of the most difficult stunts ever witnessed in the history of magic will make this event truly unforgettable,” said Felix Rappaport, President & CEO of Foxwoods Resort Casino. “Although Spencer Horsman, a member of The SUPERNATURALISTS is a world-class performer, his willingness to even attempt this feat is unimaginable.” 
The SUPERNATURALISTS: A Limited Engagement featuring Criss Angel will take the stage at Foxwoods from November 11th through 15th, and December 16th through 20th. Tickets for all shows start at $65 and may be purchased online at www.foxwoods.com , or by calling the Foxwoods Box Office at 800-200-2882 or Ticketmaster at 800-745-3000. Tickets are also available on site at any Foxwoods Box Office. 
About Foxwoods® Resort Casino Foxwoods Resort Casino is one of the premier entertainment destinations in the Northeast. As the largest resort casino in North America, Foxwoods offers a vast array of gaming in six casinos; AAA Four-Diamond hotels, restaurants from gourmet to quick service, world-renowned spas, award-winning golf, state-of-the-art theaters, and exclusive retailers. Perfect for both recreation and business, Foxwoods provides modern and versatile convention and meeting space to infuse new life into any meeting or event. Foxwoods Resort Casino is owned and operated by the Mashantucket Pequot Tribal Nation. For a comprehensive look at Foxwoods Resort Casino and Mashantucket Pequot Tribal Nation visit Foxwoods.com .
